data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Nusa Tenggara Barat, Indonesia that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nusa Tenggara Barat, Indonesia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Nusa Tenggara Barat. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Nusa Tenggara Barat, Indonesia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Nusa Tenggara Barat.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 144,385 believers in Nusa Tenggara Barat and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Mbojo people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Lord, make the 144,385 believers in Nusa Tenggara Barat to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 4,355,816 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Nusa Tenggara Barat that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nusa Tenggara Barat, Indonesia has a population of 4,500,200.

We estimate Nusa Tenggara Barat has 144,385 people who might know Jesus, 362,740 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,993,076 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 31 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we ask for networks of simple churches in every city in the state of Nusa Tenggara Barat, like Paul planted in Corinth and Ephesus.
data.verse: The churches in the province of Asia send you greetings. Aquila and Priscilla greet you warmly in the Lord, and so does the church that meets at their house.
